TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to defeat the Gnoll Chieftain. You must try again quickly.
You have defeated the Gnoll Chieftain. Staf becomes the new Chieftain and rewards you with the Tooth of Sartek.
Tauron finally has all the teeth. Only 4 pieces of Sartek remain.
You must go to Hyaan and get the Tooth of Sartek from the Gnoll Chieftain.
You must defeat the Gnoll Chieftain and help Staf become the new leader.
You must return the Tooth of Sartek to Tauron at the Horned Temple.
This Gnoll Chieftain is considerably tougher than an average Gnoll.
